frontMatter.title: The Windows Subsystem for Linux BUILD 2020 Summary
frontMatter.summary: This year at an all virtual BUILD conference we had many exciting announcements for the Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL)! This blog post gives you a summary of all the WSL news, including what’s available now and what you can expect in the future.

prev.title: Windows Package Manager CLI
prev.summary: Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget). Contribute to microsoft/winget-cli development by creating an account on GitHub.
